text: So much fun activities inside, entarance ticket is little bit pricey. There’s a comfortable waiting room for addult too, so u can choose join your kids to play or just waiting outside

First time here with our children, place is suitable mainly for 12 years old and below. Lots of interesting things to play and learn about science, nutrition, systems, solar system etc. also has a hidden spot right above the climb. Strongly recommended compared to playgrounds in the malls for its price point etc.

3 adults + 1 toddler = $47.
Definitely worth it 10-1pm.
The ‘supermarket’ area spacious and my love it so much!!!

Great spot with your kids age from 3 to 8 may be perfect. There are many activity spot even outside this billing can at for free.

And inside feels like more science themed activity.

Highly recommended to visit if you have pre-school kids. The kids loved the sandpit play area and had fun climbing the canopy to the secret playroom at Level 2. Very friendly registration crew who were helpful, understanding and exhibit a high level of service. Do book tickets early on a weekend to avoid disappointment.
